text:
There are two main issues I would like to see resolved for the JSVGCanvas.

(1) There should be a method to blank the canvas, such as canvas.setSVGDocument
(null).  Currently calling this throws an exception but it could easily be used 
to blank the screen.

(2) There seems to be a slight bug with the canvas at the moment when it is 
added to a JScrollPane.  The scroll bars do not immediately appear on the 
canvas if a new document is set that is larger than the canvas itself.  To make 
the scrollbars appear, the user needs to move the mouse pointer over the canvas 
and back off it again.
creator: David.Smith@aeroint.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
